item.title: |xue becomes !naxane
item.summary: |xue becomes !naxane when the sun rises, and in this form the birds eat him. At sunset |xue returns to his own form, and lies down to sleep. The next day at sunrise |xue becomes a larger kind of tree !naxane, but at sunset he becomes |xue again.
item.comments: 1) !nanni heard this story from his paternal grandfather (Karu); there is a picture by !nanni of the same date (see UCTLB_ D _!n004) that accompanies this story, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-5
